text: Atriplex plebeja is a species of plant in the family Amaranthaceae. It is endemic to Tristan da Cunha, including Inaccessible and Nightingale Islands. Its natural habitat is rocky shores. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Flora of Tristan da Cunha plebeja Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Atriplex plebeja
